allow:
Bash(git -C ~/.local/share/chezmoi commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Fleet theme for Emacs and improve configuration management

- Create custom fleet-ghostty-theme.el using official Zed Fleet Dark colors
- Update Emacs font to JetBrainsMono 15pt with normal weight and comfortable line spacing
- Configure doom-modeline colors to match Fleet aesthetic
- Remove auto-generated config.el from git tracking (added to .gitignore)
- Update config.org to use Fleet theme by default

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C ~/.local/share/chezmoi commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update Fleet theme modeline to use subtle gray colors

- Change all status indicators on right side to gray (errors, warnings, info)
- Update major mode and Go version display to gray
- Make VCS icons gray for more subtle appearance
- Keep Evil mode states colored for visibility

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
